Text:
Don't download this, there's a problem:
"The release from SPARKS contains some looping scenes and or glitches. Shortly after 01:11:43 for example they are at a completely different location and the sentence cuts off midway"

LOL, +17 in quality even though there's a serious problem with the Sparks release. An when you look at all the other DownHD releases you can see that they also have +10, +8. That uploader with a skull really seems desperate :D
Do not download. Definitely has a looping issue about 3 different times in the movie. Skips ahead then back. The last one actually skips back then ahead for some reason.
